about_the_game:
The Sacrifice is a turn-based puzzle game set in 17th century Salem, where you control two characters simultaneously, Sarah and the Gatekeeper. Play through 30 of the 120 levels of the full game filled with clever and unique puzzles, and break the seal that keeps your lost daughter trapped.

Ignite the fire!

The gates of Salem are waiting. Only those who are wise enough will be able to cross them.

A unique take on the genre!

Your goal is to guide the gatekeeper to the golden rune. You only have a couple of turns to do that so plan ahead!

Escape Death!

Death looms at every turn. Stay one step ahead of danger as you guide Sarah and the gatekeeper through treacherous puzzles.

Outsmart the game!

The Sacrifice is all about unique puzzles and unique mechanics. With over 120 levels in the full game, you will have to think twice and strategize your moves carefully.

  • This demo contains 30 of the +120 levels of the full game.

  • Utilize all kinds of cool mechanics like crazy teleporters, magical bridges and more!

  • Your actions will affect the story, what ending will you get?

  • Secrets?

content_descriptors.notes: Though not explicitly shown, some dialogue may reference or be interpreted as alluding to hell, harm, and violence.
